title: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a responsive design, dark mode toggle, and interactive project gallery.

title: Kommie-Keeb
description: Kommie-keeb is an 88-key custom mechanical keyboard by Souptik Samanta, featuring an elegant ANSI layout, premium Cherry MX switches, and an OLED display on a custom PCB.

title: Chaos Compiler
description: Chaos Compiler is a CoreXY-Cartesian hybrid 3D printer featuring a custom CoreXY design with a unique (Cartesian-ish) Z-axis. It will be really fast, powered by a Pi 4 for calculations, and supports automatic multicolor printing, auto print removal, and auto bed leveling within a big build volume (310x310x380 mm). Built on a tight budget in India over 75+ hours with mood swings and intense learning experiences in both Cartesian and CoreXY systems.
